oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of unidentified Union officer found in Maryland
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This crayon print shows a Federal officer in a double breasted frock coat with the button arrangement of a brigadier general. Additionally, he appears to have a single star on his shoulder board also indicating at brigadier general. The subject wears a gold ring on his left pinky finger and another ring on his right ring finger. Written in pencil is "Cardinal" which is probably the name of an artist.
